name: The Construct
description:
New character - The Construct! 

Recent changes: 
- Config option to disable content as other characters.
- Boost++ is less powerful but draws a card.
- Siege form now applies after playing a card.
- Meltdown now deals 12 damage and gives 1 Burn.
- Synchronize trigger bugs fixed.
- Wedding ring slightly less error-prone.
- Multi-playing Shield Burst no longer deals full damage each time.
- Autoturret triggers much faster.
- Golden Bullet text rearranged.
- Gatling Gun damage preview.
- Antimatter reworded.
- Minor wording updates.

Stay tuned, things are about to get ~heated~ ...
